items.value: But you can't leave yet, school session is still going!
Only a few things went down, but you can still enjoy my Baldi TV!
Grappling Hooks found in a big box!
Use these things to have some FUN!
I found my old teleportation device!
Surely, it won't be a grand failure again!
I turned the temperature a bit too high!
I wouldn't touch this fire if I was you
